name: You are the enemy
description:
A basic prototype attempting to implement a ghost capture mechanic in Pico-8. My first foray into game design and game jams, and I realized level design is harder than it seems, leading to the single screen.

Instructions:

- Arrow keys to move. Even though you are a ghost, you can't pass through walls, but try bumping into things and find out what happens!

- When you possess something, you can press X to return to ghost form.
